description: Orc Inhabitant - A Tier 2 combat-focused creature with Warrior (+30% Training), Intimidating (+1 Fear), Strong (+2 Attack), and Aggressive (attacks first) traits, plus Berserk scared and Grumpy hungry behaviors.

userStories.title: Define Orc YAML data with stats, traits, and behaviors
userStories.description: As a developer, I want the Orc defined in YAML with combat stats, traits, behaviors, and fusion options.
acceptanceCriteria: Orc entry in gamedata/inhabitants/ YAML: id, name, description, sprite, tier 2
Stats: HP (high), Attack (high), Defense (medium), Speed (medium)
Traits: Warrior (trainingBonus: 0.3), Intimidating (fearBonus: 1), Strong (attackBonus: 2), Aggressive (combat priority)
Scared behavior: Berserk (+50% Attack, -50% Defense, may attack friendlies, 30s duration)
Hungry behavior: Grumpy (reduces room productivity by 20%)
Room interactions: Barracks (+30% training), Forge (+15% crafting speed), War Band (3+ Orcs: +1 Attack each)
At least 2 fusion recipes defined
npm run gamedata:build compiles without errors
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Implement Orc trait effects and behavior states
userStories.description: As a developer, I want Orc traits to provide gameplay effects when assigned to rooms and behaviors to activate at thresholds.
acceptanceCriteria: Warrior: +30% training speed when assigned to Barracks, stacks with other modifiers
Intimidating: +1 Fear to assigned room, removed on unassignment
Strong: +2 Attack in combat only, does not affect room production
Aggressive: modifies initiative/speed for combat turn order priority
Berserk: activates when fear threshold exceeded, +50% Attack, -50% Defense, may hit friendlies, 30s duration
Grumpy: activates when hungry, -20% room productivity for all inhabitants in same room, persists until fed
War Band: 3+ Orcs in same room grants +1 Attack each, recalculated on assignment changes
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Write Orc trait and behavior unit tests
userStories.description: As a developer, I want tests verifying all Orc trait effects and behavior states.
acceptanceCriteria: Test: Warrior trait gives 30% training speed bonus in Barracks
Test: Intimidating trait adds +1 fear to assigned room, removed on unassign
Test: Strong trait adds +2 Attack in combat only
Test: Berserk grants +50% Attack and -50% Defense
Test: Grumpy reduces room productivity by 20%
Test: War Band bonus activates with 3+ Orcs, deactivates below 3
Tests in src/app/helpers/ spec file
All tests pass with npm run test
